name: GACHIMUCHI The Card Game
description:
"GACHIMUCHI The Card Game" is a simple twenty-one card game with unique dialogs.
The game is often referred to as twenty-one, which is the Russian alternative for blackjack.

Play a fun and entertaining card game, How does that feel, huh? Now will you give up? whenever you win or lose Shut the fuck up, boy, you get a unique dialog.That's power, son, that's power!
Walk through all the rounds Smart-ass. Of the card game Come on! to learn what happens in the end. Let's go!


Features of the game ♂ Card Game
♂ Unforgettable Soundtrack
♂﻿ Animated Background
♂﻿ HD 1080P
